resources.string: When opening local files associated with BibTeX entries, such as pdf or djvu files, the path specified in the \'file\' field of the BibTeX entries is modified as follows: The target string is replaced by the replacement string and the result is prepended with the prefix strig.
No application available to view files of type
Maybe the path conversion is not set up correctly?
Please specify the path or uri of the BibTeX library file.
The set BibTeX library file could not be read. Maybe the given path or uri is not correct or the SD card is not yet readable?
IO Exception while closing stream to
Exception while loading the BibTeX library file:
Due to a bug in some versions of Android the app must be closed and restarted to actually obtain the permissions that were just granted.

The paths in externally created BibTeX usually contain paths to the associated files on the creating device. Library hence needs know where to look for the files on this device. Please select the root folder containing the files in your BibTeX library.
Example:
If the paths in your BibTeX file look like this

	/home/user/my_pdfs/folder1/file1.pdf
	/home/user/my_pdfs/folder1/file2.pdf
	/home/user/my_pdfs/folder2/file3.pdf
 	...

and on your device they are in

	/sdcard/my_pdfs/folder1/file1.pdf
	/sdcard/my_pdfs/folder1/file2.pdf
	/sdcard/my_pdfs/folder2/file3.pdf
	...

please select /sdcard/my_pdfs/ in the following dialog.
Library now uses a new method to locate and open files!

Trying to find the requested file in the directory you picked. This might take a while because Android\'s DocumentFile.findFile() can be very slow... This only needs to be done while opening the first file.
Library found the file %s in %s under the uri %s.
Library failed to find the file %s inside the directory %s.
